dict.acceptation: 足够的；适当的，恰当的；差强人意的；胜任的；

sent.orig: Climate belongs to the marineness angry marquis of subtropical zone, has adequate sunlight and adequate rainwater.
sent.trans: 气候属于亚热带海洋性气侯，阳光充足，雨水充足。

sent.orig: People need an adequate supply of nutrients to an adequate defense against the pathogen.
sent.trans: 人们需要充足的营养才有足够的能力抵御病原体。

sent.orig: Desd-foldcharacteristics,non-polluting,pinhole for pelling off,uniformly thickness and width,adequate adequate adhesiveness along its full length,and high durability.
sent.trans: 易折叠，无污染，易剥离，宽度及厚度协调粘贴度强，经久耐用。

sent.orig: The relector shall have a high quality chromium plating and adequate seal to the glass.
sent.trans: 反光镜部位需为高质量的镀铬镜面，并且为玻璃镜留有足够的密封空间。

sent.orig: Coins are adequate for small transactions, while paper notes are used for general business.
sent.trans: 硬币适用于小笔买卖，而纸币则用于大的交易。
